options.description: set periods of silence parts to skip from start (from 0 to 9000) (default 0)
options.name: start_periods

options.description: set start duration of non-silence part (default 0)
options.name: start_duration

options.description: set threshold for start silence detection (from 0 to DBL_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: start_threshold

options.description: set start duration of silence part to keep (default 0)
options.name: start_silence

options.description: set which channel will trigger trimming from start (from 0 to 1) (default any)
options.name: start_mode

options.description: set periods of silence parts to skip from end (from -9000 to 9000) (default 0)
options.name: stop_periods

options.description: set stop duration of non-silence part (default 0)
options.name: stop_duration

options.description: set threshold for stop silence detection (from 0 to DBL_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: stop_threshold

options.description: set stop duration of silence part to keep (default 0)
options.name: stop_silence

options.description: set which channel will trigger trimming from end (from 0 to 1) (default any)
options.name: stop_mode

options.description: set how silence is detected (from 0 to 1) (default rms)
options.name: detection

options.description: set duration of window for silence detection (default 0.02)
options.name: window
